title: Make red riding annie and alot of other champions available to buy again
body: I want to make another account and I want red riding annie and alot of other people want her to pls make her and alot of other skins available.     PS: I am 11 turning 12 in march if you do this it would be a birthday present from League to me

replies.body: Do you know you are supposed to be 13+ to play this game? Lol...
We occasionally let some of the legacy skins out of the legacy vault, which makes them available for a short time again. Keep a look out! :3

> [{quoted}](name=1inonlyqueenbee,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AfGpEjs1,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-29T01:03:52.565+0000)
>
> PS: I am 11 turning 12 in march if you do this it would be a birthday present from League to me

Don't you need to be 13 to play this game... Your account should be deleted or something...

Edit: Also, you want to make a second account already when you haven't even reached level 30 on your main yet???? O.o
Omg i would love red riding hood annie. Her splash is ADORABLE.
I think they should make tibbers more red riding hood teme like he could have glasses and gray hair he could be grandma. WWE we got granny in the house
